name: Unbroken Gravity
description:
University of Portsmouth Game Jam 2018. Team Incompetent.

Created in Unity.

Welcome to Unbroken Gravity! You play as David as he solves puzzles, moving the mystic box filled with the hopes and dreams of children to the goal throughout the levels in various settings. Can you solve these mazes?

The player uses WASD to control David. The player must overcome both puzzles and the perspective of the layout to win. Use R to restart in the inevitability that you fail. Avoid falling onto the box of it will break destroying its contents forever!

The first level is modelled after the Indian village of Pallissery. The character is based on David L. Levy. The third level is based on Ireland where the band D-Side is from. The title Unbroken Gravity is based upon the albums Gravity and Unbroken released by D-Side.

Michael Burdge – Programmer
Melissa Green – 3D Artist, Animator
William Leggatt – 3D Artist
Taylor White – 3D Artist, Musician
Joshua Ybañez – 3D Artist
